text: Anya Chalotra is an English actress primarily known for her role as Yennefer of Vengerberg in the Netflix original series The Witcher. Before that she had a role in Wanderlust. Biography . == Early life == Chalotra was born to an Indian father and English mother. She grew up in the village of Lower Penn, in South Staffordshire, where she lived with her parents and two siblings, an elder sister Reeya and a younger brother Arun. She was raised as a Hindu.https://www.tvovermind.com/anya-chalotra Chalotra completed her schooling at the St. Dominic's Grammar School for Girls in Brewood and later completed the one-year foundation course at the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art before training for three years at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama. == Career == Chalotra has starred in several West End theatre productions including Much Ado About Nothing and The Village. In 2019, Chalotra starred in a main role as Yennefer of Vengerberg in the Netflix fantasy drama The Witcher. The series premiered on 20 December 2019. Chalotra was listed as one of Screen Daily’s ’Stars of Tomorrow’ 2020. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Television roles |- ! Year ! Title !
